data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_103541726507f5ce102689f04fe215e8.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Luo Yi's skills can create <font color="a6aafb">Sigils of Yin/Yang</font> on the battlefield. Each Sigil lasts up to 6s.
Sigils of opposite attributes will trigger <font color="a6aafb">Yin-Yang Reaction</font> when they are within a certain distance, dealing 365 (+20*Hero Level) <font color="62f8fe">(+190% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the marked enemies, stunning them for 0.3s, and pulling them toward each other.
Each time Luo Yi applies a new Sigil to a marked enemy, she gains a 300 (+10*Hero Level) <font color="62f8fe">(+150% Total Magic Power)</font> shield (up to 3 stacks) and 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 2s.

Luo Yi casts the energy of <font color="a6aafb">Yin/Yang</font> in the target direction, dealing 210<font color="62f8fe"> (+135% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to the first enemy hit and those behind them in a fan-shaped area. Enemy heroes hit are marked with a <font color="a6aafb">Sigil of Yin/Yang</font>.
Luo Yi stores up to 4 <font color="a6aafb">Dispersion</font> charges and gains 1 charge every 8s. She also immediately gains 1 charge each time <font color="a6aafb">Yin-Yang Reaction</font> is triggered.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.

Luo Yi summons <font color="a6aafb">Fire of Yang/Aqua of Yin</font> at the target location, dealing 250<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 60% for 0.5s.
<font color="a6aafb">Fire of Yan/Aqua of Yin</font> then remains at the location for 6s, dealing 50<font color="62f8fe"> (+10% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> every 0.7s to nearby enemies. It can also trigger <font color="a6aafb">Yin-Yang Reaction</font> with Sigils of opposite attributes.
The state of this skill changes on each cast.

Luo Yi creates a Teleport Circle around herself and marks the target location (within 28 units) as its destination. After a 3s delay, allied heroes (including herself) within the Circle will be teleported to the location.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Luo Yi's Cooldown Reduction is increased by 6%.

data.name: Luo Yi

__data.skilldesc: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, <font color="62f8fe">knocking back</font> nearby enemies and dealing 200<font color="62f8fe"> (+0.5 Total Magic Power)</font>-680<font color="62f8fe"> (+1.7 Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.
__data.skilldesc_text: Fire a Flaming Shot in the target direction, [C2knocking back] nearby enemies and dealing <Num1>-<Num2> [C1Magic Damage] (scales with flying distance) to the first enemy hero or creep hit.

recommendmasterplan.description: Mid Lane: Burst damage-focused, with extreme CC and DPS in teamfights.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+30 Magic Power
+5% Cooldown Reduction
+8 Magic Penetration

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage greater than <%Num3> of an enemy hero's Max HP <Num2> times within <Num1>s will scorch the target for an additional <Num5> [ffdfa2]Adaptive Damage[-] (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num6>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage greater than 7% of an enemy hero's Max HP 3 times within 5s will scorch the target for an additional 162-750 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Damage</font> (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 15s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Mana Spring: Regenerates 15% Max Mana every 10s.
Magic Mastery: Max Cooldown Reduction is increased by 5%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+50 Magic Power
+250 Extra Max HP
+20% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Magic: Dealing Magic Damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3(+0.3*Hero Level) for 2s. Stacks up to 3 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Guard: Gains a 800<font color="62f8fe"> (+1 Total Magic Power)</font> Shield that will regenerate 20s after being damaged. The Shield also grants 30 Movement Speed while it lasts and 150 Movement Speed for 1s after it breaks.

equiplist.equipskill1: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Spellbreaker: When attacking an enemy, gains 0.1% extra Magic Penetration for each point of the enemy's Magic Defense, capped at 20%.

equiplist.equipskill1: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Mystery: Gains 21%-35% extra Magic Power (scales with level).

recommendmasterplan.name: YATOU
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Seeking to revive an ancient past, she is the sole being who has mastered the secrets of Yin and Yang.

assist.desc: Luo Yi works best with Junglers who are often looking for fights around the map, such as Aamon and Karina, because she can use her Ultimate to cut down their travel time.

strong.desc: Luo Yi counters heroes with low mobility such as Eudora and Gord because they are easy targets for her Sigils and Yin-Yang Reactions.

weak.desc: Luo Yi is countered by Fighters or Tanks with high HP recovery like Uranus and Fredrinn because she can't deal enough damage to finish them off quickly.
